original_text: Christ went into the Most Holy Place on our behalf. He did this once, for all time. He did not take with him the blood of goats or young cows when he went in there. Instead, he took the blood of his own death to offer to God. In that way, he made us free from sin for ever.
korean_text: 염소와 송아지의 피로 하지 아니하고 오직 자기의 피로 영원한 속죄를 이루사 단번에 성소에 들어가셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Christ went into the Most Holy Place
He did not take with him the blood of goats
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 염소의 피를 가지고 가지 않으셨습니다

sentences.original_text: or young cows when he went in there
sentences.korean_translation: 혹은 어린 송아지의 피를 가지고 들어가지 않으셨습니다

sentences.original_text: Instead, he took the blood of his own death
sentences.korean_translation: 대신, 그분은 자신의 죽음의 피를 가지고 가셨습니다

sentences.original_text: he made us free from sin
